name: POV: You're alive during the Black Plague
name_original: POV: You're alive during the Black Plague
description:
Will you survive the Black Plague?

POV: You're alive during the Black Plague is an educational, choose your own adventure game that gives players a chance to experience what it would be like to live during the Black Plague, while focusing on how socio-economic condition during the Middle Ages effect the outcome of your story.
